backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining access control, blob storage, and all fitness‑tracking data types such as profiles, measurements, exercise plans, logs, and calorie entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report placeholder with an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend files.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and linking favicon assets.
frontend/ops/publish-draft-50-to-live.md: Runbook detailing steps to promote Draft Version 50 to live production and verification procedures.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, profile setup flow, and dashboard rendering with theming and notifications.
frontend/src/components/BurnedCalorieTra: Component for adding, editing, and viewing burned‑calorie entries with validation and optional compact view.
frontend/src/components/CalorieTracker.t: Component for managing calorie intake entries, including add/edit dialogs and optional chart and compact display.
Manages weekly exercise planning, allowing users to add, organize, and delete exercises by day and category. Integrates with backend queries to handle the current week's plan and checklists.
Displays and manages daily exercise checklists, including completion toggling, deletion, and streak calculation. Pulls today's checklist based on the system date.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with branding, user greeting, profile editing trigger, and logout button. Controls visibility of the profile edit dialog.
frontend/src/components/MeasurementsTrac: Handles adding, viewing, and editing body measurements with validation and backend updates. Displays historical measurements and supports inline editing through dialogs.
frontend/src/components/MotivationCard.t: Fetches and displays the daily motivational saying with a loading state. Shows a styled quote card with message and author.
frontend/src/components/ProfileEditDialo: Provides a dialog for editing user profile details and motivational preferences with validation. Loads existing profile data and saves updates via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressPhotoGal: Placeholder component for future photo upload and gallery features. Shows a coming-soon alert and static preview messaging.
frontend/src/components/ProgressView.tsx: Displays user progress metrics by fetching backend data and rendering charts for workouts, calories, weight, and streaks.
frontend/src/components/WeightTracker.ts: Manages weight records with add/edit functionality and displays weight trends in a line chart, optionally in compact mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls with React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user data such as profiles, measurements, weight, and progress.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/generate-favicons.ts: Generates heart‑shaped favicon images on a canvas and provides utilities to download them in multiple sizes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tabbed sections for overview, tracking, exercise planning, photos, and progress, using user profile data and various tracker components.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders the login screen with Internet Identity authentication, branding visuals, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating a user profile including name, email, motivational style, and sharing preferences, saving via backend hooks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, favicon-related issues, required image assets, and existing feature metadata.
